overview:
Sean Kelly is the founder and CEO of CORUS.

Located at www.corus-share.com CORUS is a Web 2.0 collaboration platform which combines 9 applications into a simple, best practice, business collaboration toolbox. CORUS is a horizontally innovative solution designed to address the problems of managing communications on both a personal and organisational level.

As a technologist with 20 years experience Sean applies his research and innovations to the interface of technology, commerce and the user. With a particular focus on the impact of the Internet and the power of the network his research highlights areas where opportunities arise for the creation of disruptive technologies.
